record.title: RECESS UNTIL 10 A.M. TOMORROW
record.narrative:
RECESS UNTIL 10 A.M. TOMORROW -- (Senate - July 28, 2008)

[Page: S7578]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand in recess, under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 7:55 p.m., recessed until Tuesday, July 29, 2008, at 10 a.m.
